name: Workspace Grain + Cafe - Marina Bay Financial Centre Tower 3

reviews.text:
Yesterday I had such a wonderful dining experience! The salad was absolutely delicious‚Äîthe beef was incredibly flavorful and tender, and the vegetables were fresh and crisp. It was the perfect balance of taste and texture. I even drank my salad sauce üòÇ Oh forgot to mention that I love their coffee! Hot long black.

A special mention to Nurul, who was warm, attentive, and made us feel truly welcome. Her excellent service added so much to the overall experience.

We will definitely be back!

Eating healthy can be expensive and challenging in terms of flavor. This establishment offers a free black coffee through Kris+ with a $12 minimum spend. I appreciate their food, especially the roasted pork. The salmon, chicken, pumpkin, glass noodles and mushrooms are also noteworthy. The staff consistently greet me warmly in the morning, making me feel more like a friend than a customer. Please continue to provide excellent service to encourage customer loyalty.

‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

I can't say enough good things about this coffee spot which I frequent as it‚Äôs near my office! From the moment you walk in, you're greeted with warm smiles and a genuinely welcoming atmosphere. The staff here are super friendly and always go out of their way to make sure you have a great experience. Whether you're a regular or a first-timer, they treat everyone with genuine warmth.

The coffee‚Äôs great too!  Perfect place to grab a quick cup on the go or to sit and relax during a break.

Overall, this place is a gem, and the incredible staff truly make it shine. Highly recommend stopping by if you're in the area!

Here‚Äôs where I am whenever I have KrisPay points to expense. I buy the SGD12 Workspace voucher in the KrisPay app with SGD10.50 worth of points in order to purchase the basic lite bowl (SGD12.50). The lite bowl portions are super filling for ladies, eat that and I am done for the day. Their best item is the tofu.

Great coffee! - I rely on Nurul, Kai, Jack and the rest of the team to get me caffeinated and off to a good start every weekday morning. They know my order without asking, and I always look forward to the friendly banter.  For lunch, the salad lunch is also very good, lots of healthy options- just make sure to go early enough for the best selection.
